execution_plan.description: Find all female customers' IDs from the users database (gender_code values 'F' or 'Female', case-insensitive).
execution_plan.query: SELECT DISTINCT customer_id FROM customers WHERE LOWER(gender_code) IN ('f','female');

execution_plan.description: Find distinct product_ids purchased in orders placed by the customers returned in step 1. Join Orders and Order_Items in the orders database and filter by the customer_id list from step 1.
execution_plan.query: SELECT DISTINCT oi.product_id, o.customer_id FROM Order_Items oi JOIN Orders o ON oi.order_id = o.order_id WHERE o.customer_id IN ($step1.customer_id);

execution_plan.description: Retrieve product name, price and description for the product_ids returned by step 2 from the products database.
execution_plan.query: SELECT product_id, product_name, product_price, product_description FROM Products WHERE product_id IN ($step2.product_id);
